flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Integrating electronics into everyday things that are not electronic

guide.summary: alloween 2011 is near, This year I have inspiration to actually dress up. With new products in Electro-Luminescent emerging lately, I have decided to put together some “Software” of sorts and build a Tron2 Costume. Of course I’m not trying to replic
guide.title: Tron2 Legacy Halloween Costume
